features: Soothes Sensitive Skin: This shaving foam for men soothes sensitive skin and protects against shaving irritation
Fights Shaving Irritation: A sensitive shaving foam that fights irritation from shaving, burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch
Improves Razor Glide: This shave foam improves razor glide and softens the stubble for a comfortable, close shave
Vitamin E and Chamomile Enriched: Enriched with Vitamin E, soothing Chamomile extract and Witch Hazel extract to care for your skin while you shave
Includes six (6) 7 ounce cans of NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Foam
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Foam. This NIVEA shaving foam is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin, to soothe skin and help protect against shaving irritation. NIVEA Sensitive Shave Foam for Men is enriched with Vitamin E, and soothing natural Chamomile and Witch Hazel extracts to care for your skin while you shave. This NIVEA shave foam helps to fight the five signs of shaving irritation: burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch, so skin looks healthy and feels comfortable. Featuring Skin Guard Technology, this shaving cream improves razor glide to help protect against nicks and cuts. It also softens stubble for a comfortable, close shave. You can feel good about using this NIVEA shave cream because it is dye free and alcohol free, making it safe for daily use. A daily shave foam is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Face Wash and Post Shave Balm as part of a daily skincare regimen. To use, pump NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Foam onto fingertips and massage directly onto face to form a rich, creamy lather.

Can you use this shaving foam with an electric razor? The NIVEA MEN shaving foams are not meant to be used with an electric razor. What is the color of this shaving foam? The NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Foam is white. What does it mean that this shaving foam is free from drying alcohol? This NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Foam is free from drying alcohol, which means that it hydrates your skin and softens stubble for a close, comfortable shave. What ingredients are in this shaving foam?​ You can find a full list of the ingredients in NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Foam on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page. Has the formula of this shaving foam changed? NIVEA MEN has over 100 years of skincare expertise and delivers caring, high quality and effective formulas to meet men's skincare needs. We regularly analyze our existing formulas and make improvements as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shave cream
reviews.reviewText: I love this shave foam cream. Great for all areas! Don’t think I’ll ever use a different shave cream again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Guys this is a GREAT shave gell
reviews.reviewText: Guys this is a great easy on the skin shave gell...just a little does the trick it has a pleasant yet not overbearing masculine scent and the price is right

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Wish This Was Truly Unscented
reviews.reviewText: The scent and foam of the Nivea is much better than the disgusting scent of the Gillette that I used after they discontinued their Lemon-Lime, which was the best shave cream that Gillette ever made, both in scent and foam.I donated the entire case of Gillette that I bought recently on Amazon to the local Homeless Shelter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware - Has a scent
reviews.reviewText: Beware that this product does have a scent, which is odd for a sensitive skin product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shaving foam out there
reviews.reviewText: I love this shaving foam. It was recommended from someone else who has sensitive skin. I'm happy to have learned about it as it is my new favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I've ever Used
reviews.reviewText: This shave cream was given to me on a cruise ship when I ran out of my own. It is simply the best I've ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for shaving.
reviews.reviewText: The cost per shave is very low. I love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product. The foam version, I find, gives the best shaves. My tough beard absorbs the foam quickly and makes each razor stroke smooth leaving a close shave - no irritation or nicks! The can is expertly designed - always releasing just the right amount.
